Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
August 2022 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Here we are with another release of The Justia Insider, where we share the latest company news and achievements in this month's newsletter. We are completing core projects to continue making Justia the top-notch company it is, with the best services available for lawyers and law firms. Whether an intern or a proud parent, we wish you a safe and healthy school year. Remember, our Editorial Team is always attentive to receiving your valuable feedback.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Justia Webinar: Our team is in full gear to host our second Justia Webinar presented by Justia Connect. So we started with the marketing efforts that include, among other things, adding ads to our web properties, updating our client reports and newsletters, and sending multiple blast campaigns.

Justia Elevate: We continue working on new features and resources for our Justia Elevate clients. This month we added more demo sites with new color schemes and updated our Responsive Gallery to feature these new palette combinations.

IT Maintenances: We are currently undergoing a major effort to migrate our full IT infrastructure to a secure environment. This month we migrated resources for major projects such as our Justia Lawyer Directory, Free Law, Justia Ask A Lawyer, Blawgsearch, and other internal tools.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Additional Snippets. We have improved the accessibility and clarity of the Home Ownership and Foreclosure legal guides by writing more snippets highlighting key points in these areas.
  • New 50-State Surveys. We have completed our surveys of state laws on employment-related topics, such as discrimination, meal and rest breaks, sick leave, voting leave, and vacation time. Our team will post the surveys on the Employment Law legal guide. In addition, we wrote 50-state surveys on gun laws and abortion in response to recent public debates about these topics.
  • Justia Supreme Court Site Updates. We are wrapping up the discussion about redesigning the Justia Supreme Court site's home page and case overview pages. Meanwhile, we are writing new content about landmark Supreme Court cases and the history of the Supreme Court, which will be reached from the Supreme Court home page.
  • Justia Onward Blog Posts Highlighting Justia Legal Guides. We wrote a couple of blog posts on our Justia Onward blog highlighting our Native American Law legal guide and our White Collar Crimes content in our Criminal Law center.

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Samuel Gomez

Intern Help Desk

Hello, I am Samuel! I am a knowledge enthusiast, and I like martial arts. I am a dancer, a philanthropist, a philosopher, and a video game lover, among other things. One of my goals in life is to be able to help people and make a difference in our society, and I am convinced that I will fulfill my goals.

JUSTIA PET NEWS

Lazy Homer

Homero turned three years old, and his most remarkable ability is giving his paw. His hobbies include sleeping all day and eating a lot. He loves having his tummy scratched and receiving tons of love.
- Paola Lira

Upcoming Events

REVIEWs & RECOMMENDATIONs

iHuman

Available on Apple TV

iHuman is a documentary about artificial intelligence, social control, and power. The film shows how this technology is changing our lives, society, and the future. Experts such as Ilya Sutskever and Jürgen Schmidhuber give interviews about AI and its development and implementation.

- Jose Ramos

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Haydee Garcia, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
